entry.title: Monday night: A few flurries. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending after midnight then mainly cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 13.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 29 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 15 with temperature rising to minus 11 by morning.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy late in the evening then snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15 with temperature rising to minus 11 by morning. Wind chill minus 25 in the evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 26 December 2022
